official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to count
		  a period of receipt of outpatient observation services in a hospital toward
		  satisfying the 3-day inpatient hospital requirement for coverage of skilled
		  nursing facility services under Medicare.

committee-name.#tail:
, and in
			 addition to the Committee on

, for a period to be subsequently determined by the
			 Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the
			 jurisdiction of the committee concerned

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the
			 following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Improving Access to Medicare Coverage
			 Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Counting a period
			 of receipt of outpatient observation services in a hospital toward the 3-day
			 inpatient hospital requirement for coverage of skilled nursing facility
			 services under medicare

quote.#text:
For purposes of
			 this subsection, an individual receiving outpatient observation services shall
			 be deemed to be an inpatient during such period, and the date such individual
			 ceases receiving such services shall be deemed the hospital discharge date
			 (unless such individual is admitted as a hospital inpatient at the end of such
			 period).

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1861(i) of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply to receipt
			 of outpatient observation services beginning on or after January 1, 2013, but
			 applies to a period of post-hospital extended care services that was completed
			 before the date of the enactment of this Act only if an administrative appeal
			 is or has been made with respect to such services not later than 90 days after
			 the date of the enactment of this Act. Notwithstanding any other provision of
			 law, the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Improving Access to Medicare Coverage Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may implement such amendment
			 through an interim final regulation, program instruction, or otherwise.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Health and Human Services

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1179 IH: Improving Access to Medicare Coverage Act of 2013
